lead_paragraph: After failing to successfully defend his title at the Madrid Open, Nadal, of Spain, is out of the top five for the first time in a decade.

headline.main: Rafael Nadal Drops in ATP Rankings

snippet: After failing to successfully defend his title at the Madrid Open, Nadal, of Spain, is out of the top five for the first time in a decade.
abstract: Rafal Nadal drops to seventh in ATP rankings after failing to defend title at Madrid Open; marks first time he has been absent from top five men's tennis players in 10 years; other tennis news noted.
